thread.title: Ground News - Tears Of The Kingdom Is A Technological Marvel
thread.title_full: Ground News - Tears Of The Kingdom Is A Technological Marvel

author: Ground News
title: Ground News - Tears Of The Kingdom Is A Technological Marvel
text:
Summary by Ground News The Legend of Zelda : Tears of the Kingdom was one of the five releases we gave a 10/10 in 2023. It showcased a potential that stems from a deeply intimate familiarity with a game engine. It was capable of pushing an aged console to its absolute limits, and producing magic. Share menu More
Filters 1 Articles 1 Articles All Left Center Right
Gamespot Independent: Red Ventures Tears Of The Kingdom Is A Technological Marvel The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom was one of the five releases we gave a 10/10 in 2023. It showcased a potential that stems from a deeply intimate familiarity with a game engine that can only come from having an experienced development team, capable of pushing an aged console at the end of its life cycle to its absolute limits, and producing magic.
15 hours ago · United States Read Full Article
